text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: An extension to mark a `CareTeam.contributor` in profile <http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-NursingIntervention> as the Requester of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) NursingIntervention v3.2 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/NursingIntervention-v3.2(2020EN)).
